name: Product Configurator
description:
Product configurator for Xbox controllers

#Product-Configurator     #Scriptable-objects     #Material-controller


Interactable UI contains:

  • ‘Modifications’ option that can open and close, which pushes controller to the left and opens up options on the right side
    • Colour variants displayed in blocks on the right (only for base controller)
    • Pattern variants displayed in blocks on the right (only for base controller)
    • + accessory option for controller stand and thumbsticks
  • Rotating and resetting camera view options

https://github.com/pearcejennings/Product-Configurator
